FilterItemPortable.Name: Concluidos
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="COMPOSICAO"> <TableName>AT_ITENS</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>TabFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>2</Value> <Text>Item principal</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <Label /> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="CONCLUSAOCOMPOSICAO"> <TableName>AT_ITENS</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>não vazio</Name> <DatabaseOperator>IS NOT NULL</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>true</IsFunction> </Operator> <Label /> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.COMPOSICAO IN ('2')) AND A.CONCLUSAOCOMPOSICAO IS NOT NULL</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Em Composição
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="COMPOSICAO"> <TableName>AT_ITENS</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>TabFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>2</Value> <Text>Item principal</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <Label /> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="CONCLUSAOCOMPOSICAO"> <TableName>AT_ITENS</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>vazio</Name> <DatabaseOperator>IS NULL</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>true</IsFunction> </Operator> <Label /> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
